message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. For this round, I'm offering it to you for $95. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $87 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. For this round, I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product. I hope this is closer to what you're looking for.
